product.name: Bikewa Men's Cycling Underwear with Anti-Slip Leg Grips 4D Padded Bike Shorts MTB Liner for Bicycle Biking Riding
product.description:
Each of
products are born in practice, we never stop process in discovery and trying,just for the better
,
,
and
.All this we have done is to give you a better feeling of comfort and aesthetic.
Elastic cuffs to prevent riding up
Offer great comfort and secure fit
Flat locked stitching added comfort
product.bullet_points:
• 90% Polyester, 10% Spandex
• Moisture-Wicking & Stretchy: With breathable, Moisture Wicking, and four-way stretch fabric keeps you dry and comfortable throughout your ride.
• Anti-Slip Leg Grips: The wide anti-slip leg grips provide a secure fit and prevent the legs from riding up, thereby reducing the risk of chafing while riding.
• Ergonomic 4D Pad: Enhanced with upgraded 4D padding, they absorb road vibrations to deliver lasting comfort on short and long rides.
• Elastic Wide Waistband: Soft, flexible, and designed to lay flat against the skin for all-day comfort. It provides a secure fit without digging in or rolling.
• 5-Inch Inseam: Offers ideal coverage and a secure fit under casual shorts or pants, perfect for road cycling, commuting, trail riding, or spinning.

5-Inch Inseam: Offers ideal coverage and a secure fit under casual shorts or pants, perfect for road cycling, commuting, trail riding, or spinning.
